answers.author: Clark Miller
answers.text:
I am the co-director of the Climate Change, Engineered Systems, and Society project, a multi-institutional collaboration to address the vulnerability of infrastructure to changes in climatic patterns and its implications for communities. Our challenge is to find new ways of engaging and networking engineers, policy officials, and the public in assessing vulnerabilities and creating resilience.

answers.author: Mark Abeles-Allison
answers.text:
This was our first winter with our compressed natural gas fueling station.  Two weeks of sub zero temps impacted equipment and fueling operations.  We learned several new methods for dealing with the cold but it was a challenge.  20 degrees now seems like a heatwave...

author: Clark Miller
text: As you join, please let us know who you are and what challenges are you confronting that bring you to this group.
title: What challenges are you confronting?
